text: S. þurh godes geuu Ængelandes kining grete ealle mine biscopes & ealle mine eorles & ealle mine scirgereuan & ealle mine ðegenes Frencisce & Anglisce on þan sciran þe Ðeobald arcebiscop & se hired æt Christescyrcen on Cantwarabiris habbað landes inne freondlice.

And ic kyþe eow þæt ic habbe heom geunnan þæt hi bion alc þare lande wurþe þe hi hefdon on Eadwordes kinges dæge mines mæges & on Willelmes kinges dæge mines ealdefader & on Henries kinges dæge mines eames.

And saca & socne on strande & on streame on wudan & on feldan tolnes & teames griðbreces & hamsocne forestalles & infangenes þeofes & flæmene fermðe ofer heore ægene men bennien burgan & buton swa full & swa forð swa mine ægne wicneres hit secan scoldan and ofer swa fela þegena swa ic heom to gelætan habbe.

And ic nelle þæt anig man anig þing þer ontyo buton hi & heore wicneres þe hi it betæcen willað ne Frencisce ne Ænglisce for þan þingan þe ic habbe Christe þas gerihte forgeuen minre sawle to æcere alysednesse eal swa Eadward kining & min ealdefader & min eam ær hoefden & ic nelle geþauian þæt ani man þis tobrece bi minan fullan freondscipe.
